content:
As an AI language model, I cannot point out the wineries, but here are a few notable wineries in different wine regions:

1. Napa Valley: Beringer Vineyards, Cakebread Cellars, Joseph Phelps Vineyards
2. Sonoma Valley: Chateau St. Jean, Rodney Strong Vineyards, Kunde Family Winery
3. Willamette Valley: Domaine Drouhin Oregon, Adelsheim Vineyard, Bethel Heights Vineyard
4. Finger Lakes: Hermann J. Wiemer Vineyard, Fox Run Vineyards, Dr. Konstantin Frank Wine Cellars
5. Walla Walla Valley: L’Ecole No 41, Seven Hills Winery, Dunham Cellars.
